Good and evil never harmonize. Between light and darkness there can be no compromise. Truth is light revealed; error is darkness. Light has no fellowship with darkness, righteousness no fellowship with unrighteousness. The safety of Christ's soldiers is assured only when they work and sleep with their amour on.--Ms 82, 1900, p. 12. (Diary, "From Australia to California," September 10, 1900.) 

Released March 7, 1973.
